data.message: hey ive been thru the ringer believe me you i love Oz i own my own home i have a fixed income 4 the rest of my life i'm no gold digger i dont smoke i dont drink i dont do drugs but i know how to have fun let me show you the best things in life not only do i luwve your music from the underground till now ive watched you like a reality movie the journey u have taken me on with your music where 2 from here whats next has anyone asked you what you want i would do anything to be your body guard love you Eminem Slim Marshall III your phenominal *giggles*
